intro: Psychotria megalocarpa, commonly known as the large-fruited psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. Its fruit is a red, fleshy berry that contains several seeds. Psychotria megalocarpa is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests.
